Member I am a Deviant of Many Talents unknown United Kingdom Why I Am Here - To find other furries - To herd llamas - To become a better artist Last Visit: 123 weeks ago ?????? Art Zone Personal Zone Misc. Zone This is the place where you can personalize your profile! But, how? By moving, adding and personalizing widgets. You can drag and drop to rearrange. You can edit widgets to customize them. The bottom has widgets you can add! Some widgets you can only access when you get a premium membership. Some widgets have options that are only available when you get a premium membership.
We've split the page into zones! Certain widgets can only be added to certain zones. "Why," you ask? Because we want profile pages to have freedom of customization, but also to have some consistency. This way, when anyone visits a deviant, they know they can always find the art in the top left, and personal info in the top right. Don't forget, restraints can bring out the creativity in you!
Now go forth and astound us all with your devious profiles! OK

Devious Journal Entry
Sep 4, 2009, 3:06:18 AM by ~ gfd123 Journals / Personal 1. What time did you get up this morning? Oh about 10ish
2. How do you like your steak? Rare
3. What was the last film you saw at the cinema? New Harry Potter
4. What is your favorite TV show? No Idea
5. If you could live anywhere in the world where would it be? Spain
6. What did you have for breakfast? Havent had it yet.
7. What is your favorite cuisine? Chinese.
8. What foods do you dislike? Mushrooms
9. Favorite Place to Eat? Home
10. Favorite dressing? I don't usually have any...
11.What kind of vehicle do you drive? Im only 14
12. What are your favorite clothes? Jeans and T shirt
13. Where would you visit if you had the chance? ????
14. Cup 1/2 empty or 1/2 full? 1/2 full
15. Where would you want to retire? At Work then go home and relax
16. Favorite time of day? Night
17. Where were you born? Hospital
18. What is your favorite sport to watch? Football
19. Who do you think will not tag you back? No one havent tagged anybody XD
20. Person you expect to tag you back first? Read the last question dipshit
21. Who are you most curious about their responses to this? Dont care
22. Bird watcher? Hell no
23. Are you a morning person or a night person? Night.
24. Do you have any pets? no
25. Any new and exciting news you'd like to share? No
26. What did you want to be when you were little? A motorbike racer XD
27. What is your best childhood memory? ...
28. Are you a cat or dog person? Cat
29. Are you happy? Always
30. Always wear your seat belt? On journeys over a mile
31. Been in a car accident? No
32. Any pet peeves? Huh?
33. Favorite Pizza Toppings? pepperoni
34. Favorite Flower? dont have one
35. Favorite ice cream? Mint choc chip
36. Favorite fast food restaurant? dont go to them
37. How many times did you fail your driver's test? read qu 11
38. From whom did you get your last email? My Canadian cousin (who I frickin hate)
39. Which store would you choose to max out your credit card? HMV
40. Did you do anything spontaneous lately? no
41. Like your job? no
42. Broccoli? Where!?
43. What was your favorite vacation? Turkey
44. Last person you went out to dinner with? Parents
45. What are you listening to right now? Broken beat and Scarred - Metallica
46. What is your favorite colour? Black
48. How many are you tagging for this quiz? read qu 19
49. What time did you finish this quiz? I haven't finished it yet XD
50. Coffee Drinker? sometimes
51. What's your favorite movie? Too many
52. Do you have any hobbies? Golf, Tennis(table + normal)&failing at guitar
53. What do you do to relax? sleep
54. What do you like to do for fun? sport 2 Comments Mood: Humor Listening to: Broken beat and Scarred - Metallica (qu45) Reading: nowt Watching: myself type this message (obviously!) Playing: fable2 Eating: rasin biscuits Drinking: cuppa T Devious Journal Entry September 4, 2009 2 Comments No Favourites More Journal Entries deviantID
